publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2102 Murdo Fraser: Congratulations to Ballinluig Motor Grill—That the Parliament congratulates Ballinluig Motor Grill in Perthshire, off the A9, for being named Britain’s best transport restaurant in the magazine Commercial Motor; pays tribute to the manager, Clive Bridges, and all the staff for their skills and dedication which have lead to this accolade; notes the valuable contribution made by the Ballinluig Motor Grill to the Perthshire economy with 33 jobs provided, and believes that the restaurant and other such services play a vital role in road safety as they can help prevent driver fatigue.
S2M-2102 Congratulations to Ballinluig Motor Grill (lodged on 2 December 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2102 Congratulations to Ballinluig Motor Grill (lodged on 2 December 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr John Swinney*
S2M-2102 Congratulations to Ballinluig Motor Grill (lodged on 2 December 2004) Donald Gorrie*
